divs: Sighting Detailsdriving, see an orange sphere move rapidly upward to almost a stop then a hover like ascend in a diagonal direction then it sped upwards and completely disappeared
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Orem
There were no other sightings in Orem on or around January 25th 2012
